values.name: Adrian Lara
values.hobbies: I like to read, I play video games, and I like to skate.

values.name: Jonathan Wen
values.why: I wanted to join CLAID to improve my Chinese and to help other people learn as well
values.hobbies: I enjoy listening to music/playing ukulele, and making balloon animals
values.fact: I am also president of the balloon animal club

values.name: Allen Chiu
values.why: I want to talk to new people and learn more about Chinese culture
values.hobbies: Gacha games, Anime, getting into crocheting
values.fact: I have a mold of my teeth at home

values.name: Jerry Shi
values.why: I wanted to learn more about my cultural heritage

values.name: Katelyn Li
values.why: I wanted to join Claid because I thought it would be fun, also Chinese people are fun to hang with
values.hobbies: Playing piano and clarinet and independent writing; also really like playing video games
values.fact: I like to make food and baked goods

values.name: Chelsea He-Chen
values.why: I joined CLAID because I love sharing Chinese culture with people.
values.hobbies: One of my hobbies is tying different Chinese knots
values.fact: I was born in Silicon Valley!

values.name: MJ
values.why: The people here are so cute and i love 麻将.

values.name: Karen Xiong
values.why: I joined CLAID because I want to be able to learn more about Chinese culture and to connect with others in the Chinese community.
values.hobbies: I enjoy reading, traveling, doing puzzles, and playing video games.
values.fact: I play the violin and piano.

values.name: Joyce Li
values.why: I love the close-knit community and the fun events!
values.hobbies: I like to drink coffee, play volleyball, and work out!
values.fact: I used to be a Starbucks barista!

values.name: Ming Yi
values.why: I enjoy meeting new people, learning about the culture, and performing!
values.fact: I would take dessert over an actual meal :P
